summary:
Friend: I wonder what other quirks deku has
Me: I hope there's a stupid one. Like a useless one. Like the one David Shield had...
body:
Friend: I wonder what other quirks deku has

Me: I hope there’s a stupid one. Like a useless one. Like the one David Shield had with his stupid fingers. I don’t remember what it was but I remember it was useless after I translated the korean scan for you.

Friend: he could uh bend his fingers more than normal people. Double jointed fingers on steroids

Me: yeah that

Me: can you imagine though. A really intimidating previous holder of OFA appears AND IS LIKE TOWERING OVER DEKU AND SAYING SOME REALLY HARSH THINGS. And deku finally gathers the courage to ask what their quirk is. And the previous holder is just like “oh I can grow my hair at will. That’s it.”

Friend: deku finds a way to make it useful anyways

Me: GROWS HIS HAIR TO BLIND SOMEONE

Friend: he uses it like aizawa uses his scarf thing

Me: yeah that

blog.name: words-of-fate-official
blog.title: Fate's Fanfiction Blog
blog.description:
Fate | 18 | She/Her

DeviantArt | Wattpad | Quotev | Ao3

Just a small time writer with way too much time on her hands. You'll find mostly anime fanfiction and gifs here on my page. I love talking to new people and making new friends to feel free to send me a message at any time!

Ask box is always open!

Feel free to leave me a request

Fandoms I'll Write For:

Angels of Death | Assassination Classroom | Attack on Titan | Black Butler | Blood Lad | Blue Exorcist | Bungou Stray Dogs | Danganronpa | Death Note | Death Parade | Devil is a Part-Timer | Diabolik Lovers | Durarara | Fairy Tail | Fate/Stay Night | Food Wars | Free | Fullmetal Alchemist | Haikyuu | Hunter x Hunter | Is it Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? | K-Project | Killing Stalking | Magi | Mystic Messenger | My Hero Academia | Naruto | Noragami | Ouran High School Host Club | Pokemon | Psycho-Pass | Seraph of the End | Soul Eater | Tokyo Ghoul | Yuri on Ice

Like my work? Support me on Ko-fi or PayPal!

tags: boku no hero academia x reader
summary: Worth Fighting For | Toshinori Yagi x Reader {Drabble}
title: Worth Fighting For | Toshinori Yagi x Reader {Drabble}
body:
Exhaustion overwhelmed him. Toshinori’s ability to maintain his hero form was dwindling by the day and the more he fought his body to stay in form, the more tired both his body and mind felt. For him, continuing to be a hero was an uphill battle; one that he feared he would lose in the near future.

After barely being able to stay in form long enough to hunt down and apprehend a mere petty thief, he found himself struggling to walk back home. Everything ached and his body screamed at him just to sit down and take a break, but he wouldn’t let himself. Dawn was quickly approaching and he wanted to be back home before it did. That was the sole driving motive that allowed him to make it as far as he did every day.

By the time his house was within sight, he was stumbling as he walked, barely having the energy to even carry himself back. His legs burned, his chest ached, yet he still kept going. As much as he wanted to just collapse right then and there, he made himself keep going, knowing what awaited him was the best reward of all.

As he walked through the front door to his dark and silent home, he was relieved to know he made it back just in time. After everything, he made it after all. With only a few more feet left to go, he walked through the house, passing all the rooms until he reached the bedroom. Ever so quietly, he slowly opened the door and slipped inside.

Lying in bed was you, whose sleep had yet to be disturbed by him. Wasting no time, he got in bed with you, careful not to wake you, and wrapped his arm firmly around you, keeping you as close to him as possible.

He only had a little less than an hour before you were to wake up for work, but he didn’t care. The little moments like this were what motivated him to come home each day; were what motivated him to keep on fighting despite his condition. As long as he kept fighting villains, you would remain safe in this cruel world.

Now that’s something worth fighting for.

title: Class 1-A Ranking Update
body:
So a little while ago (last year) I did a ranking (read here) based on the official test scores of the students of class 1-A. Given that we’ve just completed the Joint battles, I wanna see how that may change the rankings. 

Also, previously, I used the final results of the Sports Festival and Provisional licence exam but actually we have more details of how the students did in each part of festival and exam.

So here’s the results for the joint training:

Joint 1st (win): Bakugo, Midoriya, Uraraka, Asui, Koda, Jiro, Kirishima, Mineta, Sato, Sero, Ashido, Kaminari

Joint 12th (draw): Iida, Todoroki, Ojiro, Shoji

Joint 16th (lose): Yaoyorozu, Tokoyami, Aoyama, Hagakure

Sports Festival

When we consider the obstacle race, calvary battle and one-on-one battle individually there’s some changes. For example, we can actually rank the students, in the bottom 7 are more accurately rather than them all being joint-14th. Todoroki actually comes out as 1st. Tokoyami, who was 3rd, actually didn’t do too well on the obstacle and calvary battle, falls to 6th with Sero who did surprisingly well.

Provisional Licence

Previously, everyone who passed was joint-1st, and Todoroki and Bakugo was joint-last. But taking in consideration, the 1st phase, in which Todoroki won, he is above Bakugo. Aoyama, despite passing the exam, had a very poor performance. Asui, Jiro, Shoji and Yaoyorozu all passed the 2nd phase but because they were the second group (in unknown order) who passed the first phase, they are the top performing students of the provisional licence exam arc.

Final Rank

So according to the detailed rankings, Momo has the best performance overall. Despite failing the provisional licence exam, Todoroki & Bakugo are still highly ranked. Uraraka & Ojiro are joint 8th but the basic rank puts Ojiro just above her. Same with Mineta & Kaminari, but Mineta is far above Kaminari according to the non-detailed ranks. Tokoyami dropped the most from last time (5th to 11th/12th) from losing the joint-battle. Kaminari ascended from bottom place if you look at his performance in detail, Hagakure has the worst performance.

Sports Festival

When we consider the obstacle race, calvary battle and one-on-one battle individually there’s some changes. For example, we can actually rank the students, in the bottom 7 are more accurately rather than them all being joint-14th. Todoroki actually comes out as 1st. Tokoyami, who was 3rd, actually didn’t do too well on the obstacle and calvary battle, falls to 6th with Sero who did surprisingly well.

Provisional Licence

Previously, everyone who passed was joint-1st, and Todoroki and Bakugo was joint-last. But taking in consideration, the 1st phase, in which Todoroki won, he is above Bakugo. Aoyama, despite passing the exam, had a very poor performance. Asui, Jiro, Shoji and Yaoyorozu all passed the 2nd phase but because they were the second group (in unknown order) who passed the first phase, they are the top performing students of the provisional licence exam arc.

Final Rank

So according to the detailed rankings, Momo has the best performance overall. Despite failing the provisional licence exam, Todoroki & Bakugo are still highly ranked. Uraraka & Ojiro are joint 8th but the basic rank puts Ojiro just above her. Same with Mineta & Kaminari, but Mineta is far above Kaminari according to the non-detailed ranks. Tokoyami dropped the most from last time (5th to 11th/12th) from losing the joint-battle. Kaminari ascended from bottom place if you look at his performance in detail, Hagakure has the worst performance.
trail.content_abstract:
So a little while ago (last year) I did a ranking (read here) based on the official test scores of the students of class 1-A. Given that we’ve just completed the Joint battles, I wanna see how that may change the rankings. 

Also, previously, I used the final results of the Sports Festival and Provisional licence exam but actually we have more details of how the students did in each part of festival and exam.
